statements: SELECT * FROM Grades WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT assignment_name, grade FROM Grades WHERE student_id = 456 ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT assignment_name) FROM Grades WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade, MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM Grades WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Grades WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY submission_date DESC, grade ASC
SELECT assignment_name, MAX(grade) FROM Grades GROUP BY assignment_name HAVING MAX(grade) > 90
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY average_grade DESC
SELECT * FROM Grades WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students, COUNT(DISTINCT assignment_name) AS total_assignments FROM Grades
SELECT student_id, grade, subject FROM grades WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT assignment_id, student_id, assignment_name FROM assignments ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM grades WHERE subject = 'Math';
SELECT * FROM grades WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM grades GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM grades WHERE grade > 90 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, grade, subject FROM grades WHERE subject = 'Math' ORDER BY grade ASC;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_name, submission_date FROM assignments WHERE student_id = 123 ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT subject, MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM grades GROUP BY subject;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade, subject FROM grades GROUP BY subject HAVING average_grade > 80;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE first_name='John';
SELECT student_id, course_name, grade FROM Grades WHERE grade='A' ORDER BY course_name;
SELECT assignment_name, submission_date FROM Assignments WHERE student_id=1 ORDER BY submission_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE Students.first_name = 'John' AND Grades.course_name = 'Math';

SELECT Students.first_name, Students.last_name, Grades.course_name, Grades.grade FROM Students LEFT JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE Students.last_name LIKE 'D%' ORDER BY Students.first_name DESC;

SELECT Students.first_name, Students.last_name, COUNT(Assignments.assignment_id) AS num_assignments FROM Students LEFT JOIN Assignments ON Students.student_id = Assignments.student_id GROUP BY Students.student_id HAVING num_assignments > 3;
SELECT MAX(Grades.grade) AS max_grade, MIN(Grades.grade) AS min_grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id;

SELECT Students.first_name, COUNT(Grades.grade) AS num_courses FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id GROUP BY Students.student_id HAVING num_courses >= 2 ORDER BY num_courses DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students;
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_due_date FROM Assignments;
SELECT student_id, grade_value FROM Grades;
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, submission_date FROM Students JOIN Assignments ON Students.student_id = Assignments.assignment_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_due_date FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, grade_value FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Assignments ON Grades.assignment_id = Assignments.assignment_id;
SELECT student_name, submission_date FROM Students JOIN Submissions ON Students.student_id = Submissions.student_id WHERE submission_date < '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_name, assignment_points FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_points > 50;
SELECT grade_id, student_id, assignment_id, grade_value FROM Grades ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT submission_id, student_id, assignment_id, submission_date FROM Submissions WHERE student_id = 2 AND assignment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_points FROM Assignments ORDER BY assignment_points DESC;

SELECT student_name, assignment_name, grade_value FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Assignments ON Grades.assignment_id = Assignments.assignment_id WHERE grade_value >= 90;
SELECT student_name, submission_date, submission_file FROM Students JOIN Submissions ON Students.student_id = Submissions.student_id WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
